column4: okey guys, i know that i have to change GRUB_DEFAULT=0 in /etc/default/grub to something else. But how do i determine which number is my windows? Ive just rebooted and saw that: in the grub list are: 1 ubuntu 2 ubuntu (recovery) 3 memtest 4 memtest 5 wndows, so it looks that my windows have to have number 4 but it doesnt work.
